ENAD's Completed Projects

The following are some of the projects that were implemented by the ENAD with financial support by our partners. (This is an incomplet listing. More will be added.)

Ethiopian Center for Disability and Developmemt (ECDD)

Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Finland and the Finnish Association of the Deaf

Project Year Output/Outcome
Training of Sign Language Instructors 1980? 16 trainers
Sign Language Interpreting Training for Eastern and Southern Africa Sign Language Project Level One 1980? 16 interprters
Sign Language Interpreting Training for Eastern and Southern Africa Sign Language Project Level Two 1980? 16 interpreters
Leadership and strategic planning Training October 2004 ? trained
Ethiopian Sign Language Dictionary preparation and publication Project 2002 - 2007 Dictionary published
Deaf Women Empowerment and HIV/AIDs Prevention Project 2008 - 2011
Deaf Women Empowerment and HIV/AIDs Prevention Project 2013 - 2016
Organizational Development and Deaf Women's Empowerment Project 2017 -
Cultural Exchange Visit to Finland for Selected Members
Rapper Signmark's Performance in Addis Ababa

Federation of Ethiopian National Associations of Persons with Disabilities (FENAPD)

Federal HIV/AIDs Protection and Coordination Office (HAPCO)

Federal Ministry of Labor and Social Affairs

Addids Ababa Administration Labor and Social Affairs Agency

Federal Ministry of Culture

Federal Ministry of Health

ILO and UNESCO Area Offices

Project Year Output/Outcome
Capacity Building Project: Sign Language Interpreters English Language skills upgrading training for six months 2001 16 interpreters trained
Employment of Sign Language interpreters for selected high schools in Addis Ababa 2001
